Class Projectile

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Projectile

  • public abstract class Projectile
extends greenfoot.Actor
    This is the abstract parent class of all projectiles in the game. Projectiles have speed and damage values, and may have an associated tower.
    Version:
    1/18/2019
    Author:
    Kevin B, Kevin Y, Michael

    • Method Detail

      • checkAndRemove

        protected void checkAndRemove()
        Checks if the projectile has collided with an enemy. If the projectile contacts an enemy, the enemy takes damage and the projectile is removed. Also removes the projectile if it is at the edge of the world.
